intro: Neuroloma stenocarpum, commonly known as the narrow-fruited neuroloma, is a flowering plant native to specific regions of Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers and elliptical,革质 (leathery) leaves. Its fruits are typically small and dry, containing one or two seeds. Due to its limited distribution and specific habitat requirements, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
